name: UListView
doc:
A virtualized list that allows up to thousands of items to be displayed.

An important distinction to keep in mind here is "Item" vs. "Entry"
The list itself is based on a list of n items, but only creates as many entry widgets as can fit on screen.
For example, a scrolling ListView of 200 items with 5 currently visible will only have created 5 entry widgets.

To make a widget usable as an entry in a ListView, it must inherit from the IUserObjectListEntry interface.

Orientation:
The scroll & layout orientation of the list. ListView and TileView only.
Vertical will scroll vertically and arrange tiles into rows.
Horizontal will scroll horizontally and arrange tiles into columns.
BP_OnEntryInitialized: Called when a row widget is generated for a list item
EntrySpacing:
This deprecated property was originally BlueprintReadOnly. To satisfy the compiler requirment to have a BlueprintGetter for this property,
it relies on the newly added UFunction GetHorizontalEntrySpacing() to act as its BlueprintGetter.

methods.name: AddItem
methods.doc: Adds an the item to the list

methods.name: CancelScrollIntoView
methods.doc: Cancels a previous request to scroll and item into view.

methods.name: ClearSelection
methods.doc: Clear selection

methods.name: GetNumItemsSelected
methods.doc: Gets the number of items currently selected in the list

methods.name: GetSelectedItem
methods.doc: Gets the first selected item, if any; recommended that you only use this for single selection lists.

methods.name: GetSelectedItems
methods.doc: Gets a list of all the currently selected items

methods.name: IsItemVisible
methods.doc: Gets whether the entry for the given object is currently visible in the list

methods.name: NavigateToItem
methods.doc: Requests that the given item is navigated to, scrolling it into view if needed.

methods.name: ScrollItemIntoView
methods.doc: Requests that the given item is scrolled into view

methods.name: SetItemSelection
methods.doc: Sets whether the given item is selected.

methods.name: SetListItems
methods.doc: Sets the array of objects to display rows for in the list

methods.name: SetSelectedItem
methods.doc: Sets the given item as the sole selected item.

methods.name: ClearListItems
methods.doc: Removes all items from the list

methods.name: GetHorizontalEntrySpacing
methods.doc: Get the horizontal spacing between entries.

methods.name: GetIndexForItem
methods.doc: Returns the index that the specified item is at. Will return the first found, or -1 for not found

methods.name: GetItemAt
methods.doc: Returns the item at the given index

methods.name: GetListItems
methods.doc:
Gets the list of all items in the list.
Note that each of these items only has a corresponding entry widget when visible. Use GetDisplayedEntryWidgets to get the currently displayed widgets.

methods.name: GetNumItems
methods.doc: Returns the total number of items

methods.name: GetVerticalEntrySpacing
methods.doc: Get the vertical spacing between entries.

methods.name: IsRefreshPending
methods.doc: Returns true if a refresh is pending and the list will be rebuilt on the next tick

methods.name: NavigateToIndex
methods.doc: Requests that the item at the given index navigated to, scrolling it into view if needed.

methods.name: RemoveItem
methods.doc: Removes an the item from the list

methods.name: ScrollIndexIntoView
methods.doc: Requests that the item at the given index is scrolled into view

methods.name: SetSelectedIndex
methods.doc: Sets the item at the given index as the sole selected item.

methods.name: SetSelectionMode
methods.doc: Sets the new selection mode, preserving the current selection where possible.
